Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at LaSalle/Van Buren
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at LaSalle/Van Buren due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing at LaSalle/Van Buren due to a sick customer. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
